about: Nim is a statically typed compiled systems programming language. It combines successful concepts from mature languages like Python, Ada and Modula. Its design focuses on efficiency, expressiveness, and elegance (in that order of priority).
Chalk allows you to follow code from development, through builds and into production.
Chronos - An efficient library for asynchronous programming
A command line based editor inspired by Vim. Written in Nim.
A modern and extensible serialization framework for Nim
